name: Amily
summary: Great at writing, loves music, and has journalistic education. Skilled in research and summarizing info. Tools: search engine. Hobbies: salsa dance.

name: Kai
summary: Enthusiastic about visual arts, photography, and modern UI. Dabbles in skateboarding and landscape painting. Enjoys exploring design systems. Tools: image finder. Hobbies: urban exploration, pottery.

name: Riya
summary: Scienc-y mind, passionate about programming, bug bounties, and game jams. Once won a chess tournament. Familiar with code linters and static analysis. Tools: code checker, file manager. Hobbies: chess, mountain biking.
